01815 
01816 /* ******************** Borderselect Operator *********************** */
01817 
01818 static void borderselect_anim_channels (bAnimContext *ac, rcti *rect, short selectmode)
01819 {
01820     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
01821     bAnimListElem *ale;
01822     int filter;
01823     
01824     SpaceNla *snla = (SpaceNla *)ac->sl;
01825     View2D *v2d= &ac->ar->v2d;
01826     rctf rectf;
01827     float ymin, ymax;
01828     
01829     /* set initial y extents */
01830     if (ac->datatype == ANIMCONT_NLA) {
01831         ymin = (float)(-NLACHANNEL_HEIGHT(snla));
01832         ymax = 0.0f;
01833     }
01834     else {
01835         ymin = 0.0f;
01836         ymax = (float)(-ACHANNEL_HEIGHT);
01837     }
01838     
01839     /* convert border-region to view coordinates */
01840     UI_view2d_region_to_view(v2d, rect->xmin, rect->ymin+2, &rectf.xmin, &rectf.ymin);
01841     UI_view2d_region_to_view(v2d, rect->xmax, rect->ymax-2, &rectf.xmax, &rectf.ymax);
01842     
01843     /* filter data */
01844     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_LIST_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_LIST_CHANNELS);
01845     ANIM_animdata_filter(ac, &anim_data, filter, ac->data, ac->datatype);
01846     
01847     /* loop over data, doing border select */
01848     for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
01849         if (ac->datatype == ANIMCONT_NLA)
01850             ymin= ymax - NLACHANNEL_STEP(snla);
01851         else
01852             ymin= ymax - ACHANNEL_STEP;
01853         
01854         /* if channel is within border-select region, alter it */
01855         if (!((ymax < rectf.ymin) || (ymin > rectf.ymax))) {
01856             /* set selection flags only */
01857             ANIM_channel_setting_set(ac, ale, ACHANNEL_SETTING_SELECT, selectmode);
01858             
01859             /* type specific actions */
01860             switch (ale->type) {
01861                 case ANIMTYPE_GROUP:
01862                 {
01863                     bActionGroup *agrp= (bActionGroup *)ale->data;
01864                     
01865                     /* always clear active flag after doing this */
01866                     agrp->flag &= ~AGRP_ACTIVE;
01867                 }
01868                     break;
01869                 case ANIMTYPE_NLATRACK:
01870                 {
01871                     NlaTrack *nlt= (NlaTrack *)ale->data;
01872                     
01873                     /* for now, it's easier just to do this here manually, as defining a new type 
01874                      * currently adds complications when doing other stuff 
01875                      */
01876                     ACHANNEL_SET_FLAG(nlt, selectmode, NLATRACK_SELECTED);
01877                 }
01878                     break;
01879             }
01880         }
01881         
01882         /* set minimum extent to be the maximum of the next channel */
01883         ymax= ymin;
01884     }
01885     
01886     /* cleanup */
01887     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
01888 }
01889 
01890 /* ------------------- */
01891 
01892 static int animchannels_borderselect_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01893 {
01894     bAnimContext ac;
01895     rcti rect;
01896     short selectmode=0;
01897     int gesture_mode, extend;
01898     
01899     /* get editor data */
01900     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
01901         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01902     
01903     /* get settings from operator */
01904     rect.xmin = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "xmin");
01905     rect.ymin = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "ymin");
01906     rect.xmax = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "xmax");
01907     rect.ymax = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "ymax");
01908     
01909     gesture_mode= RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "gesture_mode");
01910     extend= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend");
01911 
01912     if (!extend)
01913         ANIM_deselect_anim_channels(&ac, ac.data, ac.datatype, 1, ACHANNEL_SETFLAG_CLEAR);
01914 
01915     if (gesture_mode == GESTURE_MODAL_SELECT)
01916         selectmode = ACHANNEL_SETFLAG_ADD;
01917     else
01918         selectmode = ACHANNEL_SETFLAG_CLEAR;
01919     
01920     /* apply borderselect animation channels */
01921     borderselect_anim_channels(&ac, &rect, selectmode);
01922     
01923     /* send notifier that things have changed */
01924     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_ANIMCHAN|NA_SELECTED, NULL);
01925     
01926     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01927 } 
01928 
01929 static void ANIM_OT_channels_select_border(wmOperatorType *ot)
01930 {
01931     /* identifiers */
01932     ot->name = "Border Select";
01933     ot->idname = "ANIM_OT_channels_select_border";
01934     ot->description = "Select all animation channels within the specified region";
01935     
01936     /* api callbacks */
01937     ot->invoke = WM_border_select_invoke;
01938     ot->exec = animchannels_borderselect_exec;
01939     ot->modal = WM_border_select_modal;
01940     ot->cancel = WM_border_select_cancel;
01941     
01942     ot->poll = animedit_poll_channels_nla_tweakmode_off;
01943     
01944     /* flags */
01945     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01946     
01947     /* rna */
01948     WM_operator_properties_gesture_border(ot, TRUE);
01949 }
01950 
01951 /* ******************* Rename Operator ***************************** */
01952 /* Allow renaming some channels by clicking on them */
01953 
01954 static void rename_anim_channels (bAnimContext *ac, int channel_index)
01955 {
01956     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
01957     bAnimChannelType *acf;
01958     bAnimListElem *ale;
01959     int filter;
01960     
01961     /* get the channel that was clicked on */
01962         /* filter channels */
01963     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_LIST_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_LIST_CHANNELS);
01964     ANIM_animdata_filter(ac, &anim_data, filter, ac->data, ac->datatype);
01965     
01966         /* get channel from index */
01967     ale= BLI_findlink(&anim_data, channel_index);
01968     if (ale == NULL) {
01969         /* channel not found */
01970         if (G.debug & G_DEBUG)
01971             printf("Error: animation channel (index = %d) not found in rename_anim_channels()\n", channel_index);
01972         
01973         BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
01974         return;
01975     }
01976     
01977     /* check that channel can be renamed */
01978     acf = ANIM_channel_get_typeinfo(ale);
01979     if (acf && acf->name_prop) {
01980         PointerRNA ptr;
01981         PropertyRNA *prop;
01982         
01983         /* ok if we can get name property to edit from this channel */
01984         if (acf->name_prop(ale, &ptr, &prop)) {
01985             /* actually showing the rename textfield is done on redraw,
01986              * so here we just store the index of this channel in the 
01987              * dopesheet data, which will get utilized when drawing the
01988              * channel...
01989              *
01990              * +1 factor is for backwards compat issues
01991              */
01992             if (ac->ads) {
01993                 ac->ads->renameIndex = channel_index + 1;
01994             }
01995         }
01996     }
01997     
01998     /* free temp data and tag for refresh */
01999     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
02000     ED_region_tag_redraw(ac->ar);
02001 }
02002 
02003 static int animchannels_rename_invoke (bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op), wmEvent *evt)
02004 {
02005     bAnimContext ac;
02006     ARegion *ar;
02007     View2D *v2d;
02008     int channel_index;
02009     float x, y;
02010     
02011     /* get editor data */
02012     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
02013         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02014         
02015     /* get useful pointers from animation context data */
02016     ar= ac.ar;
02017     v2d= &ar->v2d;
02018     
02019     /* figure out which channel user clicked in 
02020      * Note: although channels technically start at y= ACHANNEL_FIRST, we need to adjust by half a channel's height
02021      *      so that the tops of channels get caught ok. Since ACHANNEL_FIRST is really ACHANNEL_HEIGHT, we simply use
02022      *      ACHANNEL_HEIGHT_HALF.
02023      */
02024     UI_view2d_region_to_view(v2d, evt->mval[0], evt->mval[1], &x, &y);
02025     
02026     if (ac.datatype == ANIMCONT_NLA) {
02027         SpaceNla *snla = (SpaceNla *)ac.sl;
02028         UI_view2d_listview_view_to_cell(v2d, NLACHANNEL_NAMEWIDTH, NLACHANNEL_STEP(snla), 0, (float)NLACHANNEL_HEIGHT_HALF(snla), x, y, NULL, &channel_index);
02029     }
02030     else {
02031         UI_view2d_listview_view_to_cell(v2d, ACHANNEL_NAMEWIDTH, ACHANNEL_STEP, 0, (float)ACHANNEL_HEIGHT_HALF, x, y, NULL, &channel_index);
02032     }
02033     
02034     /* handle click */
02035     rename_anim_channels(&ac, channel_index);
02036     
02037     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02038 }
02039 
02040 static void ANIM_OT_channels_rename (wmOperatorType *ot)
02041 {
02042     /* identifiers */
02043     ot->name = "Rename Channels";
02044     ot->idname = "ANIM_OT_channels_rename";
02045     ot->description = "Rename animation channel under mouse";
02046     
02047     /* api callbacks */
02048     ot->invoke = animchannels_rename_invoke;
02049     ot->poll = animedit_poll_channels_active;
02050 }
02051 
02052 /* ******************** Mouse-Click Operator *********************** */
02053 /* Handle selection changes due to clicking on channels. Settings will get caught by UI code... */
02054 
02055 static int mouse_anim_channels (bAnimContext *ac, float UNUSED(x), int channel_index, short selectmode)
02056 {
02057     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
02058     bAnimListElem *ale;
02059     int filter;
02060     int notifierFlags = 0;
02061     
02062     /* get the channel that was clicked on */
02063         /* filter channels */
02064     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_LIST_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_LIST_CHANNELS);
02065     ANIM_animdata_filter(ac, &anim_data, filter, ac->data, ac->datatype);
02066     
02067         /* get channel from index */
02068     ale= BLI_findlink(&anim_data, channel_index);
02069     if (ale == NULL) {
02070         /* channel not found */
02071         if (G.debug & G_DEBUG)
02072             printf("Error: animation channel (index = %d) not found in mouse_anim_channels()\n", channel_index);
02073         
02074         BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
02075         return 0;
02076     }
02077     
02078     /* selectmode -1 is a special case for ActionGroups only, which selects all of the channels underneath it only... */
02079     // TODO: should this feature be extended to work with other channel types too?
02080     if ((selectmode == -1) && (ale->type != ANIMTYPE_GROUP)) {
02081         /* normal channels should not behave normally in this case */
02082         BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
02083         return 0;
02084     }
02085     
02086     /* action to take depends on what channel we've got */
02087     // WARNING: must keep this in sync with the equivalent function in nla_channels.c
02088     switch (ale->type) {
02089         case ANIMTYPE_SCENE:
02090         {
02091             Scene *sce= (Scene *)ale->data;
02092             AnimData *adt= sce->adt;
02093             
02094             /* set selection status */
02095             if (selectmode == SELECT_INVERT) {
02096                 /* swap select */
02097                 sce->flag ^= SCE_DS_SELECTED;
02098                 if (adt) adt->flag ^= ADT_UI_SELECTED;
02099             }
02100             else {
02101                 sce->flag |= SCE_DS_SELECTED;
02102                 if (adt) adt->flag |= ADT_UI_SELECTED;
02103             }
02104             
02105             notifierFlags |= (ND_ANIMCHAN|NA_SELECTED);
02106         }
02107             break;
02108         case ANIMTYPE_OBJECT:
02109         {
02110             bDopeSheet *ads= (bDopeSheet *)ac->data;
02111             Scene *sce= (Scene *)ads->source;
02112             Base *base= (Base *)ale->data;
02113             Object *ob= base->object;
02114             AnimData *adt= ob->adt;
02115             
02116             /* set selection status */
02117             if (selectmode == SELECT_INVERT) {
02118                 /* swap select */
02119                 base->flag ^= SELECT;
02120                 ob->flag= base->flag;
02121                 
02122                 if (adt) adt->flag ^= ADT_UI_SELECTED;
02123             }
02124             else {
02125                 Base *b;
02126                 
02127                 /* deselect all */
02128                 // TODO: should this deselect all other types of channels too?
02129                 for (b= sce->base.first; b; b= b->next) {
02130                     b->flag &= ~SELECT;
02131                     b->object->flag= b->flag;
02132                     if (b->object->adt) b->object->adt->flag &= ~(ADT_UI_SELECTED|ADT_UI_ACTIVE);
02133                 }
02134                 
02135                 /* select object now */
02136                 base->flag |= SELECT;
02137                 ob->flag |= SELECT;
02138                 if (adt) adt->flag |= ADT_UI_SELECTED;
02139             }
02140             
02141             if ((adt) && (adt->flag & ADT_UI_SELECTED))
02142                 adt->flag |= ADT_UI_ACTIVE;
02143             
02144             notifierFlags |= (ND_ANIMCHAN|NA_SELECTED);
02145         }
02146             break;
02147         
02148         case ANIMTYPE_FILLACTD: /* Action Expander */
02149         case ANIMTYPE_DSMAT:    /* Datablock AnimData Expanders */
02150         case ANIMTYPE_DSLAM:
02151         case ANIMTYPE_DSCAM:
02152         case ANIMTYPE_DSCUR:
02153         case ANIMTYPE_DSSKEY:
02154         case ANIMTYPE_DSWOR:
02155         case ANIMTYPE_DSPART:
02156         case ANIMTYPE_DSMBALL:
02157         case ANIMTYPE_DSARM:
02158         case ANIMTYPE_DSMESH:
02159         case ANIMTYPE_DSNTREE:
02160         case ANIMTYPE_DSTEX:
02161         case ANIMTYPE_DSLAT:
02162         case ANIMTYPE_DSSPK:
02163         {
02164             /* sanity checking... */
02165             if (ale->adt) {
02166                 /* select/deselect */
02167                 if (selectmode == SELECT_INVERT) {
02168                     /* inverse selection status of this AnimData block only */
02169                     ale->adt->flag ^= ADT_UI_SELECTED;
02170                 }
02171                 else {
02172                     /* select AnimData block by itself */
02173                     ANIM_deselect_anim_channels(ac, ac->data, ac->datatype, 0, ACHANNEL_SETFLAG_CLEAR);
02174                     ale->adt->flag |= ADT_UI_SELECTED;
02175                 }
02176                 
02177                 /* set active? */
02178                 if ((ale->adt) && (ale->adt->flag & ADT_UI_SELECTED))
02179                     ale->adt->flag |= ADT_UI_ACTIVE;
02180             }
02181             
02182             notifierFlags |= (ND_ANIMCHAN|NA_SELECTED);
02183         }   
02184             break;
02185         
02186         case ANIMTYPE_GROUP: 
02187         {
02188             bActionGroup *agrp= (bActionGroup *)ale->data;
02189             
02190             /* select/deselect group */
02191             if (selectmode == SELECT_INVERT) {
02192                 /* inverse selection status of this group only */
02193                 agrp->flag ^= AGRP_SELECTED;
02194             }
02195             else if (selectmode == -1) {
02196                 /* select all in group (and deselect everthing else) */ 
02197                 FCurve *fcu;
02198                 
02199                 /* deselect all other channels */
02200                 ANIM_deselect_anim_channels(ac, ac->data, ac->datatype, 0, ACHANNEL_SETFLAG_CLEAR);
02201                 
02202                 /* only select channels in group and group itself */
02203                 for (fcu= agrp->channels.first; fcu && fcu->grp==agrp; fcu= fcu->next)
02204                     fcu->flag |= FCURVE_SELECTED;
02205                 agrp->flag |= AGRP_SELECTED;                    
02206             }
02207             else {
02208                 /* select group by itself */
02209                 ANIM_deselect_anim_channels(ac, ac->data, ac->datatype, 0, ACHANNEL_SETFLAG_CLEAR);
02210                 agrp->flag |= AGRP_SELECTED;
02211             }
02212             
02213             /* if group is selected now, make group the 'active' one in the visible list */
02214             if (agrp->flag & AGRP_SELECTED)
02215                 ANIM_set_active_channel(ac, ac->data, ac->datatype, filter, agrp, ANIMTYPE_GROUP);
02216                 
02217             notifierFlags |= (ND_ANIMCHAN|NA_SELECTED);
02218         }
02219             break;
02220         case ANIMTYPE_FCURVE: 
02221         {
02222             FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->data;
02223             
02224             /* select/deselect */
02225             if (selectmode == SELECT_INVERT) {
02226                 /* inverse selection status of this F-Curve only */
02227                 fcu->flag ^= FCURVE_SELECTED;
02228             }
02229             else {
02230                 /* select F-Curve by itself */
02231                 ANIM_deselect_anim_channels(ac, ac->data, ac->datatype, 0, ACHANNEL_SETFLAG_CLEAR);
02232                 fcu->flag |= FCURVE_SELECTED;
02233             }
02234             
02235             /* if F-Curve is selected now, make F-Curve the 'active' one in the visible list */
02236             if (fcu->flag & FCURVE_SELECTED)
02237                 ANIM_set_active_channel(ac, ac->data, ac->datatype, filter, fcu, ANIMTYPE_FCURVE);
02238                 
02239             notifierFlags |= (ND_ANIMCHAN|NA_SELECTED);
02240         }
02241             break;
02242         case ANIMTYPE_SHAPEKEY: 
02243         {
02244             KeyBlock *kb= (KeyBlock *)ale->data;
02245             
02246             /* select/deselect */
02247             if (selectmode == SELECT_INVERT) {
02248                 /* inverse selection status of this ShapeKey only */
02249                 kb->flag ^= KEYBLOCK_SEL;
02250             }
02251             else {
02252                 /* select ShapeKey by itself */
02253                 ANIM_deselect_anim_channels(ac, ac->data, ac->datatype, 0, ACHANNEL_SETFLAG_CLEAR);
02254                 kb->flag |= KEYBLOCK_SEL;
02255             }
02256                 
02257             notifierFlags |= (ND_ANIMCHAN|NA_SELECTED);
02258         }
02259             break;
02260         case ANIMTYPE_GPDATABLOCK:
02261         {
02262             bGPdata *gpd= (bGPdata *)ale->data;
02263             
02264             /* toggle expand 
02265              *  - although the triangle widget already allows this, the whole channel can also be used for this purpose
02266              */
02267             gpd->flag ^= GP_DATA_EXPAND;
02268             
02269             notifierFlags |= (ND_ANIMCHAN|NA_EDITED);
02270         }
02271             break;
02272         case ANIMTYPE_GPLAYER:
02273         {
02274             bGPDlayer *gpl= (bGPDlayer *)ale->data;
02275             
02276             /* select/deselect */
02277             if (selectmode == SELECT_INVERT) {
02278                 /* invert selection status of this layer only */
02279                 gpl->flag ^= GP_LAYER_SELECT;
02280             }
02281             else {  
02282                 /* select layer by itself */
02283                 ANIM_deselect_anim_channels(ac, ac->data, ac->datatype, 0, ACHANNEL_SETFLAG_CLEAR);
02284                 gpl->flag |= GP_LAYER_SELECT;
02285             }
02286             
02287             notifierFlags |= (ND_ANIMCHAN|NA_EDITED);
02288         }
02289             break;
02290         default:
02291             if (G.debug & G_DEBUG)
02292                 printf("Error: Invalid channel type in mouse_anim_channels()\n");
02293     }
02294     
02295     /* free channels */
02296     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
02297     
02298     /* return notifier flags */
02299     return notifierFlags;
02300 }
02301 
02302 /* ------------------- */
02303 
02304 /* handle clicking */
02305 static int animchannels_mouseclick_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02306 {
02307     bAnimContext ac;
02308     ARegion *ar;
02309     View2D *v2d;
02310     int channel_index;
02311     int notifierFlags = 0;
02312     short selectmode;
02313     float x, y;
02314     
02315     
02316     /* get editor data */
02317     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
02318         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02319         
02320     /* get useful pointers from animation context data */
02321     ar= ac.ar;
02322     v2d= &ar->v2d;
02323     
02324     /* select mode is either replace (deselect all, then add) or add/extend */
02325     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend"))
02326         selectmode= SELECT_INVERT;
02327     else if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "children_only"))
02328         selectmode= -1; /* this is a bit of a special case for ActionGroups only... should it be removed or extended to all instead? */
02329     else
02330         selectmode= SELECT_REPLACE;
02331     
02332     /* figure out which channel user clicked in 
02333      * Note: although channels technically start at y= ACHANNEL_FIRST, we need to adjust by half a channel's height
02334      *      so that the tops of channels get caught ok. Since ACHANNEL_FIRST is really ACHANNEL_HEIGHT, we simply use
02335      *      ACHANNEL_HEIGHT_HALF.
02336      */
02337     UI_view2d_region_to_view(v2d, event->mval[0], event->mval[1], &x, &y);
02338     UI_view2d_listview_view_to_cell(v2d, ACHANNEL_NAMEWIDTH, ACHANNEL_STEP, 0, (float)ACHANNEL_HEIGHT_HALF, x, y, NULL, &channel_index);
02339     
02340     /* handle mouse-click in the relevant channel then */
02341     notifierFlags= mouse_anim_channels(&ac, x, channel_index, selectmode);
02342     
02343     /* set notifier that things have changed */
02344     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|notifierFlags, NULL);
02345     
02346     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02347 }
02348  
02349 static void ANIM_OT_channels_click (wmOperatorType *ot)
02350 {
02351     /* identifiers */
02352     ot->name = "Mouse Click on Channels";
02353     ot->idname = "ANIM_OT_channels_click";
02354     ot->description = "Handle mouse-clicks over animation channels";
02355     
02356     /* api callbacks */
02357     ot->invoke = animchannels_mouseclick_invoke;
02358     ot->poll = animedit_poll_channels_active;
02359     
02360     /* flags */
02361     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
02362     
02363     /* id-props */
02364     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "extend", 0, "Extend Select", ""); // SHIFTKEY
02365     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "children_only", 0, "Select Children Only", ""); // CTRLKEY|SHIFTKEY
02366 }

02380     WM_operatortype_append(ANIM_OT_channels_setting_disable);
02381     WM_operatortype_append(ANIM_OT_channels_setting_toggle);
02382     
02383     WM_operatortype_append(ANIM_OT_channels_delete);
02384     
02385         // XXX does this need to be a separate operator?
02386     WM_operatortype_append(ANIM_OT_channels_editable_toggle);
02387     
02388     WM_operatortype_append(ANIM_OT_channels_move);
02389     
02390     WM_operatortype_append(ANIM_OT_channels_expand);
02391     WM_operatortype_append(ANIM_OT_channels_collapse);
02392

02394     WM_operatortype_append(ANIM_OT_channels_visibility_set);

02398 
02399 // TODO: check on a poll callback for this, to get hotkeys into menus
02400 void ED_keymap_animchannels(wmKeyConfig *keyconf)
02401 {
02402     wmKeyMap *keymap = WM_keymap_find(keyconf, "Animation Channels", 0, 0);
02403     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
02404 
02405     /* selection */
02406         /* click-select */
02407         // XXX for now, only leftmouse.... 
02408     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "ANIM_OT_channels_click", LEFTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
